articles.title: Rare satellite footage shows the moon eclipsing the sun on a strangely crooked path - Space
articles.description: NOAA's GOES-19 satellite may have captured the first natural solar eclipse from space, with the moon's odd path explained by a spacecraft maneuver.
articles.content:
Coronagraph imagery of the partial solar eclipse on Sept. 21, 2025. (Image credit: NOAA, GOES-19 CCOR-1)
On Sept. 21, while skywatchers on Earth were eagerly watching a partial solar eclipse unfold,… [+2914 chars]
